feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:26 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 6:15 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: SW 22 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries becoming mixed with a few local snow squalls late this evening. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
